body.p: To the honorable Govener of the state of Kentuck whereas we have due knowledge that on the 16th day of July 1861 there was a fine assesd in the Court of L Carter against Samuel C. Ward for visiting the house of of Robert Buntone.

ten dollars and without any proof that the sd ward did ^not^ threten or do any thing out of order tho in the company of James Leflers which acted a little out of order and nowing that the sd ward is at this time under the doctor and has bin for three months and has but little property we sevelly pray that you will remit the fine yours respectifuly as our names may be subscribed

Samuel Martin
Clayton Davis
Charley mcKinney
James DrisBell
